author: Ina Fried
title: Crisis Text Line fills added role in coronavirus pandemic
description: For years, Crisis Text Line has served as a 21st-century version of the call-in hotline, helping a largely young clientele manage life's challenges via text message. With the coronavirus outbreak, the line is now serving a new role as well — offering aid to a…
